head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths STEIN, CELIA KOTKES

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths STEIN, CELIA KOTKES

block.p: STEIN-Celia Kotkes. It is with deep sorrow that we announce the passing of our special beloved mother, grandmother, greatgrandmother Mama Ceil, whom we all loved dearly, after a long illness on Monday, September 4, 2000. Past-president Mizrachi Women, active in Y.U., Yeshiva Chaffetz Chaim, and Young Israels of E.P. and Cedarhurst, LI. Rita Schwartz, Fred Kotkes, and William Kotkes Shiva until Tuesday AM 765 Elvira Avenue Far Rockaway
